    • Method Detail

      • getIndicators

        public java.util.List<com.fs.starfarer.api.util.Pair<Indicators,java.lang.String>> getIndicators()
        Description copied from interface: SteeringController
        Used by the input screen to display the control scheme of the currently chosen steering controller. The first entry should be a null indicator with text. It will be displayed as a section header and should contain a short label to identify the steering controller. Entries with an indicator display the corresponding icon followed by the text that should be a label for the functionality behind the indicator.
        Returns:
        A list of all indicators and their purpose that are used by this steering controller.

      • activate

        public boolean activate(com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.ShipAPI playerShip,
                        HandlerController controller,
                        com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.CombatEngineAPI engine)
        Description copied from interface: SteeringController
        This method is immediately being called after an instance was created and before the steering controller is put into service. It hands off environment variables that stay constant for the existence of the controller.
        Parameters:
        playerShip - Ship that is being steered.
        controller - Controller that is being used as an input device for steering.
        engine - Combat engine that runs the current combat and provides access to all combat related objects.
        Returns:
        True if the activation succeeded.

      • discard

        public void discard()
        Description copied from interface: SteeringController
        Called whenever a steering controller is put out of service. Any exterior references and cached data should be cleared to speed up garbage collection.

      • onTargetSelected

        public void onTargetSelected()
        Description copied from interface: SteeringController
        Called whenever the user switches targets manually. The playerShip.getShipTarget() can change regardless of this call if the targeted ship got e.g. destroyed.

      • isTargetValid

        public boolean isTargetValid()
        Returns:
        True if the playerShip.getShipTarget() is still supported by this steering controller.

      • steer

        public void steer(float timeAdvanced,
                  float offsetFacingAngle)
        Description copied from interface: SteeringController
        This method applies the per frame steering to the playerShip. It is being called during the EveryFrameCombatPlugin.processInputPreCoreControls(...) and can send commands to the playerShip that will be executed in the current frame.
        Parameters:
        timeAdvanced - How much combat progressed, this can be zero.
        offsetFacingAngle - How much the ships front should be turned to allow e.g. broadside combat.

      • renderInWorldCoords

        public void renderInWorldCoords(com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.ViewportAPI viewport,
                                float offsetFacingAngle)
        Description copied from interface: SteeringController
        Allows rendering elements as part of the combat scene.
        Parameters:
        viewport - Rendering parameters.
        offsetFacingAngle - How much the ships front should be turned to allow e.g. broadside combat.

      • calculateDesiredDistanceForOrbitingTarget

        protected float calculateDesiredDistanceForOrbitingTarget(com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.ShipAPI ps)
